short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Jira favicon with a red square to help distinguish Jira and Bitbucket from each other.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Both the favicon of Jira and Bitbucket are blue and very similar. This extension changes the Jira icon to a red square to help distinguish it from the blue quadrilateral which is the Bitbucket icon.
